allowUsersToChangePassword.description: Whether to allow users to change their own password

expirePasswords.description: Indicates whether passwords in the account expire. Returns `true` if `max_password_age` contains a value greater than `0`. Returns `false` if it is `0` or _not present_.

hardExpiry.description: Whether users are prevented from setting a new password after their password has expired (i.e., require administrator reset)

maxPasswordAge.description: The number of days that an user password is valid.

minimumPasswordLength.description: Minimum length to require for user passwords.

passwordReusePrevention.description: The number of previous passwords that users are prevented from reusing.

requireLowercaseCharacters.description: Whether to require lowercase characters for user passwords.

requireNumbers.description: Whether to require numbers for user passwords.

requireSymbols.description: Whether to require symbols for user passwords.

requireUppercaseCharacters.description: Whether to require uppercase characters for user passwords.
